We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private SchaffTrendCycle _stc;
// In Initialize()
_stc = STC(symbol, cyclePeriod, fastPeriod, slowPeriod);

// In OnData()
if (_stc.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "STC Is Ready", _stc.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "STC Warm Up Period", _stc.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "STC Current", _stc.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "STC Name", _stc.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "STC Samples", _stc.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.stc = self.STC(symbol, cyclePeriod, fastPeriod, slowPeriod)

# In OnData()
if self.stc.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "STC Is Ready", self.stc.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "STC Warm Up Period", self.stc.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "STC Current", self.stc.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "STC Name", self.stc.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "STC Samples", self.stc.Samples);
